name: SKEffectNode
desc: A node that renders its children into a separate buffer, optionally applying an effect, before drawing the final result.

items.name: var filter: CIFilter?
items.desc: The Core Image filter to apply.

items.name: var shouldEnableEffects: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the effect node applies the filter to its children as they are drawn.

items.name: var shouldCenterFilter: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the effect node automatically sets the filter’s image center.

items.name: var shader: SKShader?
items.desc: A custom shader that is called when the effect node is blended into the parent’s framebuffer.

items.name: var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue]
items.desc: The values of each attribute associated with the node's attached shader.

items.name: func setValue(SKAttributeValue, forAttribute: String)
items.desc: Sets an attribute value for an attached shader.

items.name: func value(forAttributeNamed: String) -> SKAttributeValue?
items.desc: Gets the value of a shader attribute.

items.name: var shouldRasterize: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the results of rendering the child nodes should be cached.

items.name: var blendMode: SKBlendMode
items.desc: The blend mode used to draw the node's contents into its parent’s framebuffer.
